title: NBA Finals, fan behavior, Raiders, Baker Mayfield, and free agency
itunes:title: NBA Finals, fan behavior, Raiders, Baker Mayfield, and free agency
description:
Colin breaks down what game 3 of the NBA Finals proved, horrible fan behavior, more drama for the Oakland Raiders, why Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield made a mistake, and his thoughts on NBA free agency. Guests include Ric Bucher, Kendrick Perkins, Steve Fisher, and Paul Azinger.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
